graphicmotor.animation

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphicmotor.animation.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends Object
    Animation class is used to initialized any AnimatedEntity.

    Note that users shouldn't have to use any method of this class except the constructor.

    Author:
    goozi
